name: Ulltima V: Warriors of Destiny
content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
- file2: https://lutris.nyc3.digitaloceanspaces.com/tools/innoextract/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxULTIMA5.conf
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $file2
- execute:
    args: -d "$CACHE" "$file1"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX
    src: $GAMEDIR/__support/app/dosboxULTIMA5_single.conf
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $GAMEDIR/__support/app/dosboxULTIMA5.conf
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxULTIMA5.conf
    key: aspect
    section: render
    value: true
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxULTIMA5.conf
    key: fullscreen
    section: sdl
    value: true
main_file: DOSBOX/dosboxULTIMA5_single.conf
